title: World of Final Fantasy
brief_description: Two twins journey to a mysterious world to rediscover their lost memories. In this peculiar place, the young Mirage Keepers will encounter new friends and familiar Final Fantasy heroes as they learn the truth about their past.

constellations_other.name: Oh, no! Beta!
constellations_other.description: The Sony Betacam BVP-3P was a broadcast-quality camera that used Sony's Beta system, most commonly found in consumer cameras. During the Format Wars in the 1970s and 80s, Beta lost to the cheaper and more accessible Video Home System (VHS).

description: Two twins journey to a mysterious world to rediscover their lost memories. In this peculiar place, where stacking things on one’s head is perfectly normal, the young Mirage Keepers will encounter new friends and familiar Final Fantasy heroes as they learn the truth about their past.
description_for_label: Two twins journey to a mysterious world to rediscover their lost memories. In this peculiar place, where stacking things on one’s head is perfectly normal, the young Mirage Keepers will encounter new friends and familiar Final Fantasy heroes as they learn the truth about their past.
